org.jhove2.app.util
Class PropertyFileGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.app.util.PropertyFileGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
DisplayerPropertyFileGenerator, UnitsPropertyFileGenerator
public abstract class PropertyFileGenerator
extends Object

Base class for generating editable Java properties files for features of Reportable classes (for example, properties files for configuring display of Reportable properties, or units of measure for Reportable properties)

Author:
smorrissey

Field Summary

          Base directory for output file.
protected  String className
          Fully-qualified class name for which properties file is to be generated
static String EXTENSION
          File extension for JHOVE2 properties files

          Full path to property file to be created
protected  String headerInfo
          Boiler plate text for head of JHOVE2 properties files*, specific to each class of file
protected  boolean includeAncestors
          Specifies whether to include properties inherited from interfaces and super-classes
protected  Map<String,String> prop2Value
          Key-Value map to be serialized as property file
protected  String propertyFileBaseName
          Base name for property file
protected  Set<ReportablePropertyInfo> propsList
          A set of all ReportablePropertyInfo descriptors of a Reportable class

protected String propertyFileBaseName
Base name for property file

baseOutputDirectory

protected String baseOutputDirectory
Base directory for output file. Intermediate directories corresponding to segments in the fully qualified class name will be created as subdirectories of this base directory when the property file is created

fullFilePath

protected String fullFilePath
Full path to property file to be created

propsList

protected Set<ReportablePropertyInfo> propsList
A set of all ReportablePropertyInfo descriptors of a Reportable class

Method Detail

createPropertyValues

public abstract Map<String,String> createPropertyValues()
Method to create actual list of possible property values (may be an empty list, as for units properties file)

Returns:
HashMap containing actual list of possible property values

createPropertyFile

public void createPropertyFile()
                        throws JHOVE2Exception
Principal method. Constructs a property file with JHOVE2 identifier as the key, and a "|" separated list of possible legal values (may be empty, as with units file)

Throws:
JHOVE2Exception

convertToPropsFileString

public String convertToPropsFileString(String sourceString)
Utility method to replace instances of ":" with "\:" in JHOVE2 I8R strings

Parameters:
sourceString - String to be converted
Returns:
converted String

constructFileNameFromClassName

public String constructFileNameFromClassName(String className)
Constructs relative path to properties file that is constructed from the dotted notation of the fully-qualified class name

Parameters:

Returns:
String containing relative path of new property file
